channel.title: Problem keeping server up
channel.description: I am trying to make my server 24/7 but I am having my problem. When my computer is inactive for a certain amount of time it puts itself into sleep mode and the internet turns off. This causes my server to shut down. How do I stop this from happening?

item.title: Problem keeping server up
item.dc:creator: @my_stoof my stoof
item.description:
@my_stoof wrote:

Go to your desktop and right click anywhere -Not on any icons-
Go to Personalization at the bottom.
Go to the screen saver thing. At the bottom you should see -Change power settings-
Click it and you should see something like
Put the computer to sleep = 1 minute, 2 minutes never or w/e
Change whatever time you have there to Never

Read full topic
